ygData.subject: Re: once in a blue moon post again
ygData.msgSnippet: I think playing monks is really easy. You can level like twice as fast as a caster cause you never have to wait for mana. I have a level 22 human monk, I never
ygData.messageBody:
I think playing monks is really easy. You can
level like twice as fast as a caster cause you never
have to wait for mana. I have a level 22 human monk, I
never wanted to start a iksar one. I think there are to
many iksar monks out there. Plus most iksar monks are
twinks anyway. A few days ago I saw a level 17 monk with
a jade mace, cane of tranquil and a fungi robe.
They only real bad thing about human monks is there
night blind other than that there good.<br><br>Ommuien
